post_text: April 13, 2016 at 3:51â€¯PM#1These command lines work to loop a macro from the first macro linefixture 1 at 10         2.0fixture 1 at 20         2.0fixture 1 at 30         2.0top macro 1            2.0But when I try to loop a macro from any line below the top, skipping the first line it does not continue the loop, such as.fixture 1 at 10         2.0fixture 1 at 20         2.0fixture 1 at 30         2.0goto macro 1.1.2     2.0Thanks
title: Loop From Middle
